directions.text: Coat chicken with flour, marjoram, pepper, and salt mixture, set aside remaining mixture.
Add half of the butter to a large deep pan over medium high heat.
Saute the mushrooms and onions for 10 mins then set aside.
Add rest of butter to the pan and lower heat to medium.
Brown each side of the chicken, adding mushrooms and onions after first flip
Add the chicken broth and wine, reduce heat to low and cover for 5 mins
Add remaining flour mixture to thicken the sauce.
Sprinkle parsley on top of chicken before serving.
